name: Umokay 64 DS 3: Travel in Time
summary:
Umokay 64 DS 3 is the third installment of the Umokay 64DS series, it is a series of minihacks each containing several levels to explore and a custom final boss to offer. Each installment's story is a follow up to the previous.

It is a hack of Super Mario 64 DS, based on a discord emote called umokay and its many variations.
